pages.text: The pre-epoch was destroyed by the collapse of the universe, but some ancient information remains inside the HUAJI particles, and scientists have vividly recreated the precious images left by the time, using the conscious-particle hyperresonance imaging technology.
$(l)Giant Jhnson Jone, commander of the allied APLIGEI fleet, gives a

$(l)pre-war speech in the starport$()$(br2)$(li)We should not be afraid of any difficulties, but face them with a smile. The best way to eliminate our fears is to face them!Insist ! Victory!Come on, AOLIGEI ! ! !---Giant Jhnson Jone
